body: Can this just end
So... Why this chapter was made? No progress in the plot, and nothing too special in the lewd department either. I'm confused.

Ou i got it senpai Just wanna teach pure boy lesson from real life i think in the end senpai show him and tell him everything and make boy never trust woman anymore thats why title calls gently ntr.. But if u wrong tjis author just troll People for call this manga Gently ntr this boy get cucked Hard enough for mindbroken.

why have the kid confess at the end of the last chapter if this entire one is just her fucking the blonde dude some more
it's boring and makes them seem even more weirdly malicious
Milking this series out for “NTR”
This chapter didn't develop the relationship between the MC and the girl at all, just more sex. Hopefully next chapter has more of the faggot suffering.

hmmm honestly i expected much more than this xD it was just the same  as the 2nd chapter  but oh well lets wait ch 4 and see how MC gets a mental break like all the NTR Mcs, well i dont consider this NTR cus the girl stated since chapter 1 that SHE  LOVES THE DOUCHE  so for me this not a NTR but a VANILLA with some role play.

Lmao Isee alot of people complain that generally speaking the cuck is pathetic and stupid for just sitting back and jerking off and not doing anything to stop the affair. They forget most of this stuff is made by Japanese for a Japanese audience. I just dont know why they take so serious a material that exist only for fapping. I mean, they comment about the characters in NTR as if they were real people; it´s hilarious.
I hope this has a decent ending maybe he moves on as long as he doesn't become mentally disabled like other characters

Kaito doesn't seem to be interested in the other girl, so I hope she stays as the observer. Author mentioned it feels just right, keeping the story focused on the three existing characters. | @yuzuna : volume 4 should be the final, taking theme around the entrance exam season or graduation. This one is released few days ago, and he planned on releasing the next on summer Comiket (although also admitting the deadline might be tight).
Is this the end? If no, then there will be ch4.

@Amber Turd I legit don’t understand how this is even selling well. The arts not that good and the sex scenes aren’t ether. Even if you’re a fan of NTR, it doesn’t make sense because it’s all about stealing the SO from someone. This is more like for literally no reason a couple decides to include a third party in their relationship for no other reason then to be cruel and because the girl is slow. The first one was more BSS “I loved them first” or whatever. Now it’s trying to be NTR

though my hopes for the end to this one being a bit different is low, the progress does have me a bit curious since it's not something i see regularly in NTR.  where as normally we have person A in a ship with person B and person C finds a way to get into a ship with person B, here we have persons B and C in a ship and they are trying to drag person A into the fold ( possibly to baby trap them and take responsibility should person B and C get to careless.)  I hope in this case the newly established person D sees that what persons B and C are doing to person A is messed up and pulls person A out of that toxic relationship with B and C and persons A and D get together, but i just have this gut feeling that the author will play it safe and will give us the standard NTR ending with person A being betrayed by everyone.

It must have sold well, it's as they say a suckers born everyday. The author is going to milk the story and the gullible but even the animation was bad and the first 2 chapters are definitely not NTR despite what the society rejects want to believe. The douche comes across as insecure and the author is insulting peoples' intelligence by trying to claim the 2nd girl is smart.
hope the story continues.
Hopefully Elon musk was right and Japan ceases to exist coz of its low ass birthrate
The blonde dude has the same mentality as a child. He keeps messing with the black haired dude because he likes him, and he's too mentally retarded to just confess his feelings.
It feels it didnt need a continuation after the second one at least for the story sake

Lol looks like the other girl is the next target, as for some reason he mentions knowing she’s always liked books which apparently already is enough for the second girl to be fond of him just for noticing. Seriously besides the dudes strange obsession with the kid, which in the real world be some kind of inferiority complex, why do these authors make the women absolutely brain dead.
bitch is comeback
Honestly, continue to be so obsessed by trolling this kid when he got the girl since so long is really cringe or he's gay maybe, who knows.
Can't really understand the dialogue but I can already tell nothing important happened compared to the previous 2 and this is gonna get dragged out.
